participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge and fostering growth in children.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, loves to explore her feelings and abilities in a whimsical way.
participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i am very lonely. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.
